1.title: Who is Gaining??

11.content:
Liam?

Niall?

Zayn?

All of them?
11.title: Who in 1D gains?

112.content:
Niall walked off the stage at the end of his performance, with the crowds cheering being the only thing that he could hear, drowning out everything else. Including his assistant, who was attempting to communicate something, which seemed important, considering how frantic their hand gestures were.

Giving his assistant a ‘can’t hear you’ gesture, Niall continues walking, eventually he finds his dressing room, and shuts himself inside, finally silencing the crowd outside who was still cheering for him.

Observing his quiet and meticulously clean dressing room, Niall spots something; a crystal bowl filled to the brim with sweets, along with chocolates and crisps.

Niall’s stomach rumbled at the sight of such a delicious spread, and the blonde quickly walked over and scooped a handful of the assorted goods into his mouth, stifling a moan at how good it tasted.

After spending the next twenty minutes making his way through the entire bowl, Niall sits back onto couch and closes his eyes, only to be awaken by....
112.title: a special gift

choices: Niall feels a tingly feeling spread over his body
The door opens, and someone from 1D walks in
Niall’s belly begins to shrink back
1123.content:
Niall jolted up, looking around taking in his empty dressing room.

“What the hell was that!?” Niall wondered

He leaned forward to get up when another bursting sound rang out, this time even louder than before. Confused, Niall glanced down, and gasped at what he saw.

Niall’s previously toned (well relatively toned) mid section had surged out into what could easily be called a gut, with little love handles on either side that were stretching Niall’s size medium shirt.

Below that Niall realised that the bursting sound had originated from his skinny jeans, which were unable to contain the not so skinny Niall, and had quickly ripped.

While trying to get up, Niall realises that the seat of his pants had also given way, and his larger ass had squeezed itself through the widening gap.

Niall wonders what could have caused this, when....
1123.title: What just Happened?

114.content:
The boys were relaxing on the tour bus after yet another live show.

Harry looked around, watching his bandmates, each of whom were absorbed in their pastimes. Zayn was sleeping soundly, mumbling incoherently, while plastered to Liam’s side, who himself was quietly watching something on his iPad.

Meanwhile Louis was scrolling through Twitter and Niall was snacking on some crisp while reading.

Bored out of his mind, Harry grabbed his phone off of his jeans, deciding to read his emails. Looking through various obvious scams, along with messages from management, Harry eventually came across something that caught his eye.

“FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY!!! ORDER NOW FOR FREE DELIVERY!!!”

Curious, Harry tapped the link, bringing him to what looked like a health food page. It describes that the promotion is for a pill that changes a persons metabolism and body chemistry in order to improve health and wellbeing.

Scanning the wall of text, Harry saw the words ‘body of your dreams’ along with ‘completely safe and scientifically proven’. Deciding to take a chance, Harry clicks order, and makes sure to have the pills sent to the nearest post office, which he would have someone pick up for him.
114.title: All of them.

choices: Harry gains weight while browsing the web
Harry wants to try the pills on his bandmates
1141.content:
Waking up the next morning, Harry opens his phone to find a new email, telling him that a parcel was dropped off for him a couple hours ago, and was sitting in the kitchen.

Harry shot up, excited to try the pills on both himself and his friends. He walks into the kitchenette area of the bus, to find a fairly large nondescript box.

Tearing into it, Harry pulls out a tub with ‘body of your dreams!’ written down the side. Harry opens the tub and pulls out a single pill, inspecting it closely. The pill was small, round, and bright in colour, almost resembling a skittle or some other kind of candy.

Deciding to test the pill out, Harry pulls out a coke and places the pill on his tongue, before taking a large sip of coke.

At first Harry feels nothing, and he realises how stupid he was. Who just orders a random pill off the internet and expects it to do anything good?

Harry grabs the tub of pills and the box and hides it in his bunk, careful not to wake anyone up, before lying down and opening his laptop.
1141.title: The Pills Arrive

choices: Zayn’s stomach begins to poke out (slow growth)
Nothing out of the ordinary happens (focus on Harry’s weight gain)
11412.content:
“Dammit Harry!” Zayn thought, cursing his curly haired bandmate.

Zayn was annoyed as because for the third time this week Harry had lost his favourite t-shirt, and now everyone else had to help him retrieve it. “Or else” Harry had said, not even jokingly.

Rolling his eyes, Zayn lifted Harry’s quilt and looked underneath, finding a tub of sweets hidden in the corner.

“Hah, no wonder Harry’s been looking fuller lately, he must be sucking down these things when we aren’t looking.”

Zayn was of course referring to Harry’s recent weight gain, which just in the last week had led to a stern talking to from management about eating habits, along with the importance of exercise.

Giving up the search, Zayn instead grabs a handful of sweets, piling them into his mouth, savouring their flavour, before grabbing another handful. Tucking the remaining sweets back into the corner, and putting the quilt back over, zayn returns his bunk.
11412.title: Someone else finds the pills

choices: Eat a handful himself to see what happens
Convince Harry to eat a handful
Trick Niall, Liam or Louis into eating a handful
114122.content:
Zayn grimaced as he shifted in the mirror, sucking his belly in to resemble a flat stomach, before letting it back out to reveal an obvious beer belly. In the past few days Zayn had overtaken Harry and was now putting on more weight himself, enough that the stern lectures that were directed at Harry now came Zayn’s way instead.

While Harry had merely gained a pot belly, Zayn’s gut seemed to get bigger and rounded all the time, and Louis had even noticed (with a hint of jealousy) that Zayn’s arse seemed wider than normal and was filling out his jeans more than it ever had.

Zayn was baffled, after all, he wasn’t even eating any more than normal, just those health lollies he found on Harry’s bunk. Zayn tries to put the pieces together in his head to explain why he was blowing up so quickly, when it hit him that the lollies had to be linked somehow. And Zayn was going to find out how.

He decides to....
114122.title: Zayn’s stomach begins to poke out (slow growth)

choices: Share them equally with one (or more) of his bandmates
Throw them away and forget about them
1142.content:
Although Harry tried to be sneaky about, there was no way that he would be able to sneak a bunch of pills onto the bus without their knowledge. So he wasn’t terribly upset when management quickly found the jar of pills, and promptly confiscated it, citing safety concerns. Though luckily Harry had managed to stash 5 away in his pocket while everyone was distracted.

So, Harry was now left with only a small handful of these pills left, what should he do with them?...
1142.title: Management Confiscates the Pills
